评论概述: Hooray! They are long enough for 36" inseam
评论详情: I am tall with long legs.  These are long enough that my ankles are covered.  They wash and dry quite nicely.  I can wear them year round,  They dress up or down with no problem.

I did not have high expectations for these since most of my other amazon fashion purchases have been a fail, but these are great! They’re so comfy and really like lounge pants, but they are also cute enough that they are great for going out as well! I’ve had them for over a year and have to say these are good quality!
Fit so well. I’m 5’ and they fit normal length, not cropped but that’s what I was hoping for. Super cute! Thick material.

I ordered a size L, I’m 5’5 and currently weigh 147. I’m 19 weeks pregnant and I feel as though these will last another 2+ months before the waistband becomes too tight. They’re super comfortable and soft! Only complaint is how long they are, but they just barely touch the floor on me while barefoot. Definitely recommend!
Great quality for the money. I'm 5'9" would have liked them a little longer.
Tight waist band, fabric is odd and not breathable at all.  Pills easily
I like the color but are made weird. Maybe it’s my shape but not flattering.  Material isn’t so much clingy but shows all. Maybe material is too thin. Definitely paid way too much.
The color is MUCH darker than pictured on the website.

When I purchased these slacks, I didn’t realize the material was sweater-like and not for our warm climate. But, I have had them hemmed and find them comfortable for our mild “winters.” They are also well-made and thus look expense. I’m glad I purchased them as I find them slimming though I wear a size 3X.
I always get lots of compliments when I wear these. They are flattering and comfortable.

5’3, 124lb, ordered a small. These pants fit so bad i had to try them on multiple times to make sure i wasn’t seeing things! Starting with the insane crotch fold which I’ve never seen before in my life! Then they somehow managed to give me hip dips that i don’t have! The waist fit comfortably but the fabric was itchy, so even if the fit was good i would still return due to fabric. Not worth the price, wouldn’t recommend
thick heavy material is decieving. nit flattering and pants are a weird length
they look great on. super comfy and pretty
These are perfect for lounging or going out! Definitely my kind of style

评论概述: looks great and breathes very well
评论详情: love the feel of these, they breathe very well and especially through warmer weather are super comfortable. Not extremely warm if its a little chillier and there is a breeze but overall these are a staple in my closet!
I ordered these pants and the top that goes along with it and it’s comfy and so cute. I can wear this to work or wear it lounging around.

For reference I am 5’4” 155 lbs typically an 8/10 in pants. Amazon recommended a Medium for me but I ordered a Large and I literally love these lounge pants. Elastic waist, Super soft, swingy fabric which look expensive and look great with flat sandals or chunky sneakers. Lightweight and great transition piece. Only wish they had pockets. Will be buying more. Well worth the price.

I really like these pants.  They are easy to grab and look good with a t shirt or a silk blouse. My only complaint is that they are ‘hair magnets’.  My daughter’s white dog came over and I was covered in hair! I had to really work to get it off. Just an FYI.

These are beautiful, but the waistband is tight. I am 5’4” and 113 lbs. I tried the small, but exchanged them for a medium. They fit very comfortably, and the waist isn’t squeezing me. They flow beautifully and can be worn with tennies or heels. You can wear them during a  night out or to lounge in at home with a t shirt.

评论概述: Super comfortable.  Not for tall gals
评论详情: Purchased these based on an IG Influencer.  Sadly, they were too short for me and had to be returned (I'm 5'9)  If you are 5'7 or shorter, get them.  They are stretchy, warm and very flattering.  If you can snag the matching long sleeve sweater top, even better.
Again low quality fabric  Awkward short pant

The thing about these pants that I really don’t like is the waistband. The elastic band in the waist is not stitched/attached into the pants and it’s constantly bending over. For pants that are $50 this should not be so cheaply made.. you can find plenty of other pants with similar quality but are made better. I don’t feel like straightening and unrolling my waistband every time i wear these, and sometimes they roll over while you’re wearing them and it looks so bad!!! Gives you a weird chunky waistband look. The price of these is just not worth it
The waistband is too narrow and tight and the legs are super wide. I love a wide leg pant but this sizing is weird. Felt too cheap to be $50

评论概述: So flattering! Just a little itchy at times
评论详情: I love these pants! I actually wear them to work sometimes and they’re comfortable for sitting in a chilly office all day. The only downside is that sometimes the fabric feels a little itchy on my legs.

The overall quality is good, looks and feels like a high quality lounge pant. They are a warmer fabric, like a wool mix. HOWEVER stars taken off for extremely tight waistband. 5'6 and 165lbs. I take medium in everything. These pants are short, and no matter where I put them on my waist, they squeeze out a muffin top. Not flattering...
Very soft but no pockets and material is heavy.
Stylish and comfortable

评论概述: These are great but the bottoms are much wider than pictured 4 stars
评论详情: These are a great pair of casual pants. What is surprising is how heavy they are weight-wise, which is suspect is due to the extra fabric with the ribbing. I’m talking seriously heavy. The bell bottoms are much wider than the picture and they are a bit longer than is typical for this type of pants. Since the hem is finished with a knit edge, shortening them isn’t feasible. I’m 5’4” and they’d be better for someone about 3” taller. Still a good choice for casual pants that don’t look like sweatpants.
I’ve purchased three pairs of these. They are super cute and comfortable.

评论概述: Perfect for both casual and office
评论详情: Product fits very well; looks professional and does not change with washing.
I just had a hip replacement and needed soft, comfortable pants and these for the bill perfectly. I wear them to physical therapy and at home and they are great. I’m back to buy more colors!
Surprisingly good quality look, fits true to size. I bought a S and a M. Prefer S as felt old lady in M, thought comfy.
Purchased multiple colors the black were about an inch shorter still great quality and style though
fits great, is very comfortable, wear it like everyday!
Great pant and great price. Fits well and looks great. Buy them!

评论概述: SEE MY UPDATE - Comfy and make your booty look gooooood
评论详情: Update: it’s half a year ish later and they’ve unfortunately gotten a bit scratchy on the inside so I do not enjoy the feel of them anymore :/  So comfortable! I wouldn’t wear these out but these are perfect lounge pants! They haven’t pilled after a few washes and I’ve received compliments from my boyfriend that they make my booty look good!
Loved the pants, but I ordered black and navy pants were in the package

If you are looking for a comfy but elevated pant that you can wear out of the house.. these are it! I have them in grey, black and brown and wear them more than any of my other pants!! I have washed them several times (hang dry) and they hold up so well. Definitely worth the price, but you can also wait until they go on sale.. because they will.

These pants are so cute and fit me so perfectly, that I ordered 2 more pair. They're  by far my favorite pants.. I'm 5 feet 5  and weigh 110 pounds and the small size fits just right. I love the high waist, too!.
Loved the material of these pants, however they do run a bit small. I ended up returning due to the fact that they show all my curves and areas I don’t love.

The sizing on these is all over the place. I could have worked with that (return and try a different size) but they way too long. They appear above the ankle on the model. I'm on the shorter side of average height (5 ft 6 in) so I expected them to be longer on me. I didn't expect them to be about 9 inches too long. Literally all the way over my feet and a couple inches past my toes!! I've learned my lesson. This is the second style of pants I've tried from this brand. I can buy their tops, sweaters and dresses. I can not buy their pants.
These sweater pants are so soft and comfortable and they fit me so well.

I'm curvy with a small waist. My normal size is 10 or 12 so i started with  large. Definitely knew they were too big right away. Swapped for a medium.  These accommodate curvy hips and flatter a small waist. If you have the opposite shape you likely won't need to size up. I ended up getting 2 colors as they look so good on my curves and are comfortable
I love Drop sweater pants so tried these longer ribbed ones. Medium not heavy weight. Going back to their bootcut ankle height pants.

These are almost perfect. The fit is cute. The fabric looks nice but the waist band is too tight. I’m between a small and medium and bought a medium. The large elastic waist band around the waist is very constraining but the real deal breaker is how itchy they are. I didn’t realize this until I took the tag off and wore them. Now I can’t return them. If you want something soft and comfortable theses are probably not for you.

Love these pants!! I’m surprised these are great quality, more of a thicker & heavier material. Warm and super flattering! I am about 5’6, 120 pounds and ordered size small and I think it’s a good fit! I’m going to order another color because I love these so much but I may try the XS and see how they fit!

评论概述: Could be a free people dupe
评论详情: Love the feel and fit of these knit sweater pants! The ribbed soft wide leg pant fit perfectly on my 5’2 frame…high waisted and comfy! These could easily pass as a free people item (I have two pairs of theirs)!
I've had these pants for a few months now, they're definitely cute and comfortable, but unfortunately they don't wash up well. Mine were pilling and getting fuzzy by the second time I washed them.

评论概述: I adore the fabric and comfort
评论详情: The only thing, I’m 5’ and midsize, so M was too long for me, I don’t think it’s the products fault in so short haha but still will need to get it fix. This is a comfortable fit for sure.
These pants are stylish, soft and comfortable. You can wear them dressed up or just as lounge pants. Not see through and has a nice texture and stretch. Love them!
Kinda tight on my butt and shows my underwear line, ended up returning  Otherwise, it’s comfortable
I absolutely love the fit and feel of these pants! They are so comfortable and if I'm just lounging around the house I still feel put together since they're so stylish
They are knit, wide leg pants. I really like them. I got them on sale. I'd really like to get more, but the price point is too high.

评论概述: Size M, 16 weeks Pregnant. Love them!
评论详情: I bought these to wear to work during pregnancy because I’m tired of just leggings or maternity jeans. They are well made. I got the Heather sand color in a size M. I’m 5’5 and 16 weeks pregnant and am happy with the size I chose.
But it was bigger than expected.

评论概述: Heavier than I expected (a good thing)
评论详情: These are really comfortable pants - great for going out, work and general all-purpose pair of pants.  Very happy with them.
Very stylish! Cute sweater pants!
Although I like these pants they run short. I am 5'7" and the small only comes to just above my ankles.
This was perfect length for wearing high waisted on my 5’1 frame. They might be too short for taller girls.

The fit was nice, and the length was great! I loved the style but I couldn’t stand keep it on for more than a couple seconds. I felt like I was being stabbed by a bunch of stubble. Horrible material feel even though it looked great. Had to return immediately. Wouldn’t even consider keeping it.
I’m 5’2”, and XXS the length will fit.

Pleasantly surprised with the quality, looks a lot more expensive than it was.  I wanted a good top to match and after perusing The Drop site, discovered the Clancy Drawstring Hoodie is the matching top.  Both look really cute together.  I’m 5’6”, 135 lbs. and the medium pants were loose, but I wanted that look.  The medium top, if someone is inclined to get it, was kind of big. I will probably exchange for a small.  I got the gray pants , a nice gray color, and will get the black as well.
Highly encourage this purchase. Not too heavy, not see through & look great with any sweater or even as lounge pants
The fabric was soft and had a more expensive feel to them, but I just didn’t love how they fit on me. Definitely show all the curves but not in the way I was hoping. Had to return.

I am 5'2" and 154lbs, I got a large and they fit wonderfully.  I knit sweaters and these pants completely complement my sweaters.  These pants are as comfortable as leggings  but are very dressy looking.

I originally purchased an XXL and a 2XL.  They both fit.  I ultimately kept the 2XL.  I don’t care for my pants to fit tightly through my thighs and the 2XL just fit better.  These are lighter weight but not transparent.  They look very nice on.  The quality seems good.  They are quite comfortable.

As a plus-sized woman, I didn't buy these for a flattering look, I should say. I bought them for working-at-home lounge pants that didn't feel like I was wearing PJ bottoms. They fit that bill. I'm short and they graze the floor when I'm just in socks. (5'2") They are roomy and soft and not itchy. I am pleased

评论概述: Thick elastic waist band is not sewn into place
评论详情: would not recommend for anyone with abdominal chronic pain. If you're looking for loose, comfy pants for work, so you don't have to wear restrictive pants, these are not it. Their really cute but the waist band twists frequently and obviously I can only wear them when I'm not experiencing pain/cramps/ bloating/ period. Warm, color is accurate, thick sweater material, good quality besides the cheaply made elastic waist. Fine value for money but I can't wear them as much as I planned to, and I'll still have to buy a different pair at some point soon
The seam had loose stitching after 1 wash. The fabric is comfy and warm, but don’t think they are worth the price.

I have neuropathy in my hands and difficulty with buttoning pants and I wanted to find cute pull up, no tie, no snap, no button pants. I found them!  I am 5.4" and the are the perfect length as they just touch the floor but do not drag as I walk.  This also means I do not step on them nor have to get them altered!

These pants, or my favorite purchase from Amazon! Made very well out of a woven material. They truly are sweater pants. They’re a very light and breathable material while also keeping you warm during these colder months. Perfect color to go with any type of outfit, they can be dressed up or dressed down in the best way. I love to wear them out to dinner, or wear them inside when I’m feeling extra cozy with an oversized sweater or sweatshirt!

评论概述: Very comfy pants! Nice high waist.
评论详情: These pants are cozy, comfy, soft, and warm. Cute, nice and long. Has a good high waist on them. Not much control for my curves. Something I would absolutely love to lounge around in at the house, or go to a spa day in.
Really great quality, I would size up though. The band around the waist is just a tad smaller than I expected, but otherwise great purchase!
Cute, flattering, medium weight. Just needs pockets!
These are adorable. High waisted and the material is really soft and sturdy. Not cheap feeling at all! The material is super stretchy

These fit me perfectly I’m 5’8 and 180lbs and I love the way these fit! They’re super soft! I  feel with these you could either dress them up or down and if you’re looking for that “clean girl aesthetic” these are definitely a must have!
(Amanda) I ordered these and my goodness. They’re sooooo float and comfy. I wear these basically every day before bed 😂💕
These sets are sooo dang comfy!!! I have them in 4 colors and they are a good airport outfit 🤭
Pants were full of white particulate with a strong soap fragrance. Pretty gross.
The waistband is kinked & elastic is sewn kinked & bent.  I have 2 other colors that fit, feel & look amazing
Size fit right, perfect for traveling or everyday errands. The waistband and stretching and I haven’t had issues with it folding over. Can be dressed up or down.
I loveeee these pants!!! They’re so cute and extremely comfortable and amazing quality!
Love these. So soft and comfortable
Love these pants. They are a gorgeous color and the material is lovely. The whole outfit is great actually. Highly recommend.

Every loungewear set I own by The Drop always has the best quality material. It’s soft, comfortable, and luxury-like. Each piece does run a bit big, so I would recommend sizing down if you prefer a more fitted fit.

I got the darker beige- I’ll start by saying they’re very stylish and comfortable. However I wish I would’ve known just how see through they were before I stepped outside. If you plan on stepping in the sun at all you can see everything. You’ll definitely have to wear shape-wear or something underneath.
Gorgeous color, perfect fit, soft and snuggly. Thick luxurious fabric. Love them, will definitely hand wash and line dry these.
They are a great pair of pants. I was worried that the waistband would be too tight but it was not a problem.
These pants were much heavier than expected. The material was also itchy and not comfortable.

I wanted to love these because the fabric is so nice but they ultimately didn't fit and a different size wouldn't have made a difference.  I am 5'11" and the length in the crotch just isn't it, it was digging in so hard, and wearing them lower would be unflattering.  The fabric shows every imperfection so keep that in mind.
I think they look great and I love the way the fit/feel. Soft, ribbed, flared and the hem is kind of curly. They're cute. Only negative is they seem to fade with multiple washings.
Great quality fabric and loose fitting. I ordered a size s and am 5’7 @ 130 lbs
Truly so comfortable- The quality is amazing for the price The perfect airport outfit
I just got these and tried them on although I feel they run smaller I'm very happy with the fit. Definitely size up. I can't wait to wear these out and about!
I was looking for something that would give me an elevated look I wear with tennis shoes or slides. I have purchased them in three color look so much better than sweats or yoga pants.
I’m 5’1 and this was waaaay to long on me.
Bought this in an XS, worried that it might be too long as I’m only 5’1 but it’s the perfect length- anything longer than it would not be right. Comfiest pants ever to lounge in!
It is itchy. You were all right. Were it not for that, it’s a nice heavy weight.

They’re a nice thick material, definitely not cropped. I’m 5’5 140lbs, I’m in between sizes and i sized up to a medium but they’re too baggy on me, I’m going to exchange them for a small. Hopefully they hold up for how expensive they are

These pants show EVERY lump and bump on your body. I wear them as MFH attire. I do not think casual pieces like this should require shapewear but something like slip shorts may be fine without restricting you too much.
